data.subheading: Query data in columns c1, c2 from a table
Query all rows and columns from a table
Query data and filter rows with a condition
data.code: SELECT c1, c2 FROM t WHERE condition;

data.subheading: Query distinct rows from a table
data.code: SELECT DISTINCT c1 FROM t WHERE condition;

data.subheading: Sort the result set in ascending or descending order
data.code: SELECT c1, c2 FROM t ORDER BY c1 ASC [DESC];
